alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 10 at 2:05PM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations mostly between 3 and 7 inches, but another 8 to 15 inches are possible above mountain pass level. Winds gusting mostly as high as 50 mph, but gusts to 65 mph are possible on ridge tops. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure they are prepared for dangerous conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Significant blowing and drifting snow will especially impact portions of Interstate 15 from Monida Pass to Lima, as well as over Raynolds and Targhee Passes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
